titles: A Merry ballad of a rich maid that had 18 seuerall suitors of seuerall countries otherwise called The scornefull maid  : to the tune of Hoop do me no harm good man.
notes: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Contains four illustrations, with ornamental borders.
Right half of sheet contains: The second part of The scornefull maide, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
